name: SALE 10% OFF Box of 6 Miniature Cards Poppy Dreams Series (Handdrawn Originals) - Soft Pastel Green
description:
This listing includes:

5 x Poppy Dreams Miniature Cards (Approximately 5cm x 7cm)
1 x Hearts Me Miniature Card (Approximately 5cm x 7cm)
1x Square Matching Origami Box with handdrawn illustration (Approximately 7.5cm x 3.5deep)

The Poppy Dreams Theme - Life is beautiful, live your dream.

It is perfect for as a hostess gift or an elegant addition to your stationery supplies.

Each picture on the card is unique and opens up to a pastel green blank insert for you to write your message. It features the beauty of poppies dancing in the air, adding colours to your day.

This set comes in  Pastel Green (As shown) or Pastel Peach. 

THE HAND-DRAWN DESIGN (Not Printed):

MATERIALS & TECHNIQUES:
All the cards are freehand drawings (not printed) using Steadtler Karat Aquarell Water Colour Pencils on water colour papers.


NO two cards are identical.

The cards may vary slightly from the photo shown due to the handdrawn and handmade nature.

Check out the other Poppy Dreams Series cards and stationery.

name: SALE 15 Percent OFF - Lil'Bookmates and Friends By Chyrls Origami - Set of 2
description:
This listing is for Set of 2 the Lil'Bunny.

You will receive:
2 x Lil'Bunny bookmates
1 x Chyrl's Origami Box

The colour of the ribbons on the Lil'Bunny varies to match so if you prefer a certain colour, please state that in your message to Seller and I'll pick one right for you!


Send your heartfelt greetings to your loved ones and your best friends, to show them how much they mean to you.

The Lil'Bookmates range from Chyrls Origami presents in each set an exquisite origami booklet accompanied by a delicately folded origami animal bookmate.

Choose from a stable of cute and lovable Lil'Bookmates : lil'bunny, lil'terrier, lil'jumbo and many more!

You can also pamper yourself by collecting all the available Lil'Bookmates on offer.

The Lil'Bookmates come with the origami box. The origami box you receive may differ in colour as shown due to the availability of the paper. However, you can be assured that they will all look as pretty and quality!

You may also like to choose your own miniature card from my store to match.

Happy Collecting.

name: SALE 15 Percent OFF Set of 3 Assorted Accordian Cards - Easter Edition
description:
This listing is for Set of 3 Accordian Cards - Easter Edition.

Pick from the range of designs shown here. For more details of the individual cards, you can see them at my store under the individual card listing.

This range of Easter Edition Accordian Card features the pattern from my Flora Series and leaves, a lil'bunny cutout.

Each card opens to approximately 14.5cm x 10.5cm and folds neatly into a 3.5cm x 10.5cm card.

There is a matching pattern cut out on the insert for each of the cards, The of the card has the handwritten greetings "Happy Easter" and more rooms for your own personal message.
It is a perfect choice for Easter. :)

These cards are exquisite and handsigned individually.

Patterns of the cutouts varies slightly from the photo due to its handmade nature. All cards are carefully crafted to ensure that each piece is as beautiful!

Each card comes with a matching handmade Accordian Series envelope.

name: My Paper Cottage Collection
description:
This handcrafted origami card from "My Paper Cottage collection" is perfect for expressing your thoughts to someone special for any special day.

This particular one has a Golden Yellow Colour scheme with flora cutouts.

Each paper cottage is unique and opens up to a blank insert for you to write your message.

It has a beautiful green Satin ribbon above the front of the card where the door cutout is.


Each card comes with a handcrafted envelope.


Size: 7.5cm x 10.5cm (Approximate)

name: Set of 10 Assorted Handmade Envelopes - Pastel Accordian
description:
Its a perfect addition to your stationery and perfect gift to your loved ones.

Every set is beautifully crafted and finished with a satin bow.

This range handcrafted envelopes from my "Accordian Series" are handfolded individually from high quality sponge pattern paper.

I use them for my range of Accordian cards and other smaller sized cards.

Each envelope is handfolded individually, signed at the back with a beautiful butterfly emblem cutouts.

All envelopes have an adhesive tape at the tip for you to seal it.

Dimensions: 8cm x 11.5cm

What you receive may vary slightly in the colours and pattern from the photos shown as each piece of envelope is handmade and handcut to style.
However, I promise that each piece is carefully crafted and looks beautiful!
